title: More effective disk sorting logic needed when processing border values for row values
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 

1. Sort 40000 rows of data on disk.
2. Set the program to process the data less than 40000 rows.
3. Save the file as a temporary file.
4. Load the file into memory.
5. Perform the sorting operation on the data.
6. Save the sorted file as a temporary file.
